Entry - Class in Unnamed Package

R

run(KnowledgeBaseAppActions) - Method in class UserInterface
The `run` method presents a menu for interacting with a knowledge base application, allowing users to load a file, add statements, look up definitions, check confidence levels, save to a file, and quit.
